bValues._instruction: Add the b values coresponding to this acquisition.

bVectors._instruction: Add the b vectors coresponding to this acquisition.

dwellTime._instruction: Enter the dwell time of this aquistion.

echoTime._instruction: Enter the echo times of this acquisition (TE).

fieldOfView._instruction: Add the field of view of this image.

flipAngle._instruction: Enter the flip angle of this scan (preferred units: degrees).

interSliceGap._instruction: Enter the inter slice distance of this scan.

inversionTime._instruction: Enter the inversion time of this aquistion.

MRAcquisitionType._instruction: Add the type of sequence readout (2D or 3D).

MTState._instruction: Boolean stating whether the magnetization transfer pulse is applied.

nonlinearGradientCorrection._instruction: Has this scan, been corrected for gradient nonlinearities by the scanner sequence?

numberOfVolumesDiscardedByScanner._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by scanner before the first volume.

parallelAcquisitionTechnique._ instruction: Enter the parallel acquisition technique sequence name for this scan. 'GRAPPA' for most Siemens machines and 'SENSE' for most Philips machines.

phaseEncodingDirection._instruction: Add the direction along which phase is modulated which may result in visible distortions.

pulseSequenceType._instruction: Add the type pulse sequence used for this scan.

radiofrequencyCoilType._instruction: Add the type of radiofrequency coil.

repetitionTime._instruction: Enter the echo time of this acquisition (TR).

sliceOrder._instruction: Enter the time in which each slice have been acquired within each volume.

sliceTiming._instruction: Enter the time in which each slice have been acquired within each volume.

spoilingState._instruction: Boolean stating whether the pulse sequence uses any type of spoiling strategy to suppress residual transverse magnetization.

voxelSize._instruction: Enter voxel size this image: in this order x,y,z.
